summary: A top-division football club in a coastal country has completed the free transfer of a veteran central defender from a rival league, agreeing a two-year contract with an option for a third year based on appearance targets.

event_type.category: Player Transfers, Trades, and Contract Signings

summary: A university basketball program from an inland industrial city won the national collegiate tournament, overturning a double-digit halftime deficit to finish a month-long unbeaten postseason run.

event_type.category: Major Tournament Results and Championship Outcomes

summary: An unseeded doubles pairing won the premier annual tennis tournament held in a temperate coastal resort, defeating three higher-ranked teams in succession and clinching the final in a match tiebreak.

event_type.category: Major Tournament Results and Championship Outcomes
